meta.name: Inside Classical
meta.description: Series in which the BBC orchestras and their specially invited guests perform concerts in some of the UK's most prestigious concert halls.

videos.title: A Classical Christmas
videos.overview: A Christmas concert full of festive favourites. The BBC Concert Orchestra and BBC Singers perform White Christmas, The Carol of the Bells and more. Presented by Petroc Trelawny.
